summary: Eleven-year-old Alex and his fellow homemade heroes are having a backyard blast. Battles rage, knights fight and damsels distress in a cardboard Camelot of dirt-bike steeds, aluminum foil ... See full summary »
cast: Johnny Morina|Maggie Castle|Christopher Olscamp|Justin Borntraeger|Billy Coyle|Jeoffrey Graves|Malcolm McDowell|Peter Aykroyd|Mélany Goudreau|James Rae|Jamieson Boulanger|Roc LaFortune|Michael Ironside|René Simard|Melissa Altro|Barbara Jones|Charles Edwin Powell|Michael Yarmush
title: Los chicos de la tabla redonda
